caption.p: Viability of C. albicans ATCC 10231 cells treated with different concentrations of Thymus camphoratus and Thymus carnosus essential oils. One-way ANOVA was performed separately for each species and values are expressed as % of mitochondrial activity relative to control (mean ± SEM of three independent assays). ∗∗ p < 0.01, ∗∗∗ p < 0.001, ∗∗∗∗ p < 0.0001, compared to control.
